plugin.name: LocRouter
plugin.description: Meta locator routing location requests of picks and origins to actual locator implementations.

group.name: RouterLocator
group.description: Locator parameters: Router. This locator requires the plugin "locrouter" to be loaded.

parameter.name: regions
parameter.description:
A GeoJSON or BNA file defining locator profiles by region. Supported polygon attributes:
name: Name of polygon
locator: Name of the locator interface
profile: Name of the locator specific profile
minDepth: Minimum depth in km
maxDepth: Minimum depth in km

group.name: initial
group.description: Configuration of initial locator used to create an initial solution based on a pick set. If a solution is found, relocate of the actual locator configured in the region file is invoked.

parameter.name: locator
parameter.description: Name of the initial locator interface.

parameter.name: profile
parameter.description: Profile name of the initial locator, e.g., iasp91.
